headline: Will Earnings Beat and a US$65 Billion Plan Reshape Dominion Energy's (D) Growth Narrative?
summary: In February 2026, Dominion Energy reported fourth-quarter 2025 and full-year 2025 results showing higher sales of US$4,093 million for the quarter and US$16.51 billion for the year, with net income rising to US$567 million and US$2.998 billion respectively, alongside 2026 operating earnings guidance of US$3.45–US$3.69 per share. The company also lifted its five-year capital investment plan to about US$65 billion, largely to meet fast-growing data center electricity demand in Virginia and...

content.title: Will Earnings Beat and a US$65 Billion Plan Reshape Dominion Energy's (D) Growth Narrative?
content.summary: In February 2026, Dominion Energy reported fourth-quarter 2025 and full-year 2025 results showing higher sales of US$4,093 million for the quarter and US$16.51 billion for the year, with net income rising to US$567 million and US$2.998 billion respectively, alongside 2026 operating earnings guidance of US$3.45–US$3.69 per share.
